casebody.data:
DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL
v.
PECK. 2016-1490 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 17, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

DISCIPLINARY CASES

Sua sponte, Gregory Lawrence Peck, Attorney Registration No. 0040211, last known business address in Oxford, Ohio, found in contempt for failure to surrender attorney-registration card and file affidavit of compliance on or before March 5, 2018.
